<a id="BoneMap"></a>

# BoneMap

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Describes a mapping of bone names for retargeting [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) into common names defined by a [SkeletonProfile](SkeletonProfile.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class contains a dictionary that uses a list of bone names in [SkeletonProfile](SkeletonProfile.md) as key names.

By assigning the actual [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) bone name as the key value, it maps the [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) to the [SkeletonProfile](SkeletonProfile.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Retargeting 3D Skeletons](../tutorials/assets_pipeline/retargeting_3d_skeletons.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="BoneMap_signal_bone_map_updated"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**bone_map_updated**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#BoneMap_signal_bone_map_updated)

This signal is emitted when change the key value in the **BoneMap**. This is used to validate mapping and to update **BoneMap** editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="BoneMap_signal_profile_updated"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**profile_updated**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#BoneMap_signal_profile_updated)

This signal is emitted when change the value in profile or change the reference of profile. This is used to update key names in the **BoneMap** and to redraw the **BoneMap** editor.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="BoneMap_property_profile"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[SkeletonProfile](SkeletonProfile.md) **profile** [ðŸ”—](#BoneMap_property_profile)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_profile**\ (\ value\: [SkeletonProfile](SkeletonProfile.md)\ )
- [SkeletonProfile](SkeletonProfile.md) **get_profile**\ (\ )

A [SkeletonProfile](SkeletonProfile.md) of the mapping target. Key names in the **BoneMap** are synchronized with it.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="BoneMap_method_find_profile_bone_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **find_profile_bone_name**\ (\ skeleton_bone_name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#BoneMap_method_find_profile_bone_name)

Returns a profile bone name having `skeleton_bone_name`. If not found, an empty [StringName](StringName.md) will be returned.

In the retargeting process, the returned bone name is the bone name of the target skeleton.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="BoneMap_method_get_skeleton_bone_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **get_skeleton_bone_name**\ (\ profile_bone_name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#BoneMap_method_get_skeleton_bone_name)

Returns a skeleton bone name is mapped to `profile_bone_name`.

In the retargeting process, the returned bone name is the bone name of the source skeleton.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="BoneMap_method_set_skeleton_bone_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_skeleton_bone_name**\ (\ profile_bone_name\: [StringName](StringName.md), skeleton_bone_name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#BoneMap_method_set_skeleton_bone_name)

Maps a skeleton bone name to `profile_bone_name`.

In the retargeting process, the setting bone name is the bone name of the source skeleton.
